channel.title: [PI] I need help [PI]
channel.description: Ok as many of you know the source FormationX V3. Im wanting to take out the Client details when you click the tool tab. But im having trouble doing so. Does anybody know how to? If so please leave a reply or leave a PM, because im working on a project and need to know how to get rid of it.
